trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Niagara Falls
There were no other sightings in Niagara Falls on or around March 27th 2009
divs: sighting detailsan entity was observed looking into my living room window. the window is in the back of my house. i saw the entity looking into my living room window. it ran away when i turned the light on and went outside. the entity moved\ran very quickly and disappeared in the darkness as it ran away from me. the entity was approximately 4 & a half feet tall. there was no communication between the entity and myself. there were no ufo's observed with the sighting of the entity. the entity wore a dark\black one piece suit that did not reflect any light. the duration of the event was very short. approx 1-2 minutes.
Summary: Entity observed looking into living room window.
